name: 曾百由
objective: 基礎電路分析、交流電路分析、電子電路原理、放大器電路、電機機械、電力系統設計與匹配、電動機驅動與設計及實驗(作)。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Circuit Analysis
3. Resistive Circuits
4. Inductance and Capacitance
5. Transient Analysis
6. Steady-State Sinusoidal Analysis
7. Frequency Response
8. Electronics
9. Diodes
10.Amplifiers
11.Bipolar Junction Transistors
12.Field Effect Transistors
13.Operational Amplifiers
14.Signal Processing
15.Electromagnetics
16.Motor and Generator
materials: “Electrical Engineering” 5th Ed., Allan R. Hambley, Prentice Hall 2010
